abilities.description: The user transforms into a large mass of poison and creates three massive poisonous dragon heads that can attack and terrorize opponents. The poison dragons are extremely dangerous and can silence or intimidate even the most notorious criminals.

keyMoments.title: Hydra Technique Revealed
keyMoments.description: Magellan uses the Hydra technique for the first time in the anime, creating three massive poisonous dragon heads to silence the rowdy Level 6 prisoners.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of one of Magellan's most powerful techniques, establishing the deadly versatility of the Doku Doku no Mi.

abilities.description: The user can perfectly transform into any person they have touched, copying their appearance exactly. In this episode, Bon Clay uses it to transform into Zoro.

keyMoments.title: Bon Clay Appears as Zoro
keyMoments.description: Bon Clay uses his Clone-Clone Fruit powers to appear before Luffy disguised as Zoro, creating an emotional fake-out before revealing his true identity.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bon Clay's continued mastery of his Devil Fruit ability and creates an emotionally impactful moment by reminding Luffy of his scattered crew.
